title: Things are oddly small
body: First time playing league on new comp. The cursor (target indicator and how you click on things), minimap icons, menu, chat and the shop are about 1/4 the size of what they should be. This makes the game REALLY hard because its hard to read and things are very hard to click on. Can anyone please help fix this problem i'm having.

replies.body: Nvm i fixed it, THANKS SO MUCH!
Thanks, i changed in game resolution to 1920x1080 and the DPI and it fixed everything but the cursor. Any advice (the cursor is still small but everything else is normal)?

This issue is usually caused by 4K which we don't currently support.  You may need to reduce your resolution down to 1920x1080 at most.  This can also be caused by any third party programs for league that you might have active, and removing that may help.  Finally, you can adjusting your DPI settings:  

Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

If those steps don't help, then it may be necessary to try another monitor.  Hope that helps!
